data.persona: I am a farmer.  My family and I live right outside of the kingdom.  We will soon be harvesting.  After harvest, my sons and I will take our goods to the town to sell.
data.description:
You are in the Launching point.
The Launching point features a number of large wooden planks sitting at a downward slope going straight into the water.  On each side of the launching point there sits a large, ornate bronze figure of a light house that is used to tether the ships to the dock and keep them from casting away while the sailors prepare to board the ship. The launching point is very narrow, with large stone braces on either side of the dock.
The knight and the sailor are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a hoe for digging.

data.short_motivation: I am following the knight at the king's request
data.mid_motivation: I am headed to a neighboring kingdom to see the king that sent for me
data.long_motivation: I am told the king wants me to supply his kingdom with some rare plants from my farm when I harvest them

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get ready to meet the king
